price: (Bu delil) Allah tarafından (gönderilen) tertemiz sahifeler okuyan bir rasûldür.
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
